paragraphs.text: Our goal is to not mess it up! And to have good profit margins.
paragraphs.name: d33a

paragraphs.text: I’m Italian. We measure things in generations, not quarters.

paragraphs.text: I had recently fallen into the scale trap. Started with something that I believed was badly needed which was simple & just a few services.

paragraphs.text: Then my ears were full of “you’ll get killed by competition if you don’t scale fast” or “you need to increase your offerings” and I did that.
